QuestData.Title: WANTED: Aggregate of Doom
QuestData.Description:
Attention all workers:
We got ourselves a problem down in the thicket.
A golem is trekking through the worksite, causing all sorts of trouble.
Grab a rock and get to throwin'. The dredger that takes it out gets the rest of the day off.
- Foreman Scug
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A lumbering mass of sin and stone, wreaking havoc on the dredger's worksite.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and slay the Aggregate of Doom.
QuestData.RewardText: You did it then? Fair enough. Now we can all get back to work.
